attributes.action: put in a simple, fair and auditable system of expenses in place for MP, councillors, members of quangos and all public servants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No special arrangements should be made with the Inland Revenue for MPs to avoid tax and the Inland Revenue should deal with them as they would with any self employed person.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
